title: Finest Years - Churchill as Warlord 1940-45
description:
Harper - Hastings, Max - Finest Years - Churchill as Warlord 1940-45
 William Collins | 2010 | ISBN: 0007263686 | English | 644 pages | PDF | 95.5 MB

 One of the best books ever written about Churchill Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ Hastings's efficient, soldierly prose marches along at a brisk pace and carries the reader with it. He has drawn on copious original sources and consulted experts familiar with them, enabling him to cast fresh light on familiar episodes
 The book's portrait of Churchill is scrupulously fair and often deeply moving Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ in fact Hastings excels with all his character portraits, especially with Roosevelt and Stalin. Hastings is truly a master of strategy and high command.
